name: Advanced URL v4
description: RegExp, that splits your URL into protocoll, user, password, subdomain, domain, topleveldomain, path, filename, filetype and GET-parameters.
author: Timmaeh.de
replace: Protocoll: $1n User: $3n Password: $4n Subdomain: $5n Domain: $8n Domainendung: $9n Path: $10n File: $12n Filetype: $13n GET-Parameters: $14
